juxt.grab.alpha.graphql/arguments-defini.juxt.grab.alpha.graphql/description: The instant the change applies. If a date, this would be the midnight of the staff member's location.

The person who will be absent from work (because they are on holiday!)

Must be the id of the person
The date the holiday begins (inclusive). Must be in ISO 8601 format
The date the holiday ends (inclusive). Must be in ISO 8601 format
An optional description, useful for an individual to label a holiday
The juxtcode of the person who has the laptop
Provide this to update an existing entity.
Lower case string, e.g. github
